room_title: Escape room "Saving Santa" by Escapology Garwood in Garwood
review: This was such an awesome experience. First time doing an escape room and did it with my wife and young kids. Everyone had a blast and we Saved Santa!!!! The owners and staff were all very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend to everyone to go here.

room_title: Escape room "Saving Santa" by Escapology Garwood in Garwood
review: We had som much fun Saving Santa! What a pristine and gorgeous facility! I went with my husband and my 8,6, and 5 year olds! We had so much fun bonding and working as a team to solve puzzles! It was seriously the best escape room experience I have ever had and I was with my kids! Canâ€™t wait to try out the other rooms with my adult friends! 100% recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Saving Santa" by Escapology Garwood in Garwood
review: We tried the new Escapology Escape Room in Garwood tonight!  Beautiful place with such an inviting atmosphere immediately when you walk in.  Staff was so nice and friendly.  Michael and John (who is a long time Fanwoodian) welcomed us immediately.  We had a blast with the kids and we "Saved Santa" with 12 minutes to spare!  So much fun! Highly recommend checking it out.  Thanks for a great night out with the kids!
